Text: Please Seed Brothers & Sisters, It would be greatly appreciated.

I wanted to buy this album, went to a lot of site's, "only available in the US" (I live in Eur). D'oh! Then WTF am I supposed to do? There's no valid alternative (here) for pirating :( Oh well, their loss I spose...
And the award for Most Random Album Cover goes to: We Were Promised Jetpacks for their album, "These Four Walls"!
